LA Lakers: L.Ball, K.Caldwell-Pope, B.Ingram, K.Kuzma, J.Randle.

The Lakers have two really good lineups. With a net of +54.7, this is the Lakers most all-around and tested lineup, having appeared in 7 games. That being said, there's a hidden gem lineup of Clarkson, Hart, Ingram, Kuzma, and Randle with a +62 Net on 77% TS.

Oddly enough, only two of the Lakers seven lineups are a negative. Both contain Ball and Lopez. Lonzo seems to work way better with Randle on the floor.
